author: kristwaa
msg: DERBY-3326: Introduce a caching logical connection and logical prepared statement in the client driver. This commit is a preparation step to allow for reuse of existing tests by adding a decorator that creates pooled connections with statement pooling enabled. Note that the decorator can be used even if statement pooling is not supported, as the current situation is for the embedded ConnectionPoolDataSource.
